name: Live?Twin Ki-sikil Frost
text: If you control a "Lil-la" Monster Card}monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Live?Twin Ki-sikil Frost" once per turn this way. If your opponent adds a card(s) from the Deck to the hand by a card effect and you control an "Evil?Twin" monster: You can banish this card from your GY; draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Live?Twin Ki-sikil Frost" once per turn.
